column2: B/E units for 1H after tariff cuts are 590k, while planned 2H wholesales of 650k far exceed that. Hitting the

column2: unit target is key to achieving 2H OP goal of 1,039 oku and ROS 3.9%.

column1: 関税軽減後は米国の平均変動利益単価が高くなり、米国への台数アロケーション増加による連結全体利益への貢献度大
column2: Tariff cuts lift avg. var. profit per unit in the US, so higher allocation to US drives consolidated profit.

column2: need higher avg. var. profit via large high-margin models and stronger base earnings (used cars, service, etc.)

column2: Achieving B/E units below 200k requires expanding high-margin models and strengthening base earnings.
